title: Organic Oven Bakery and Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Organic, Western, Take-out, Bakery, Canadian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Established in 2002, this bakery specializes in allery-free baking. Offers desserts, baked goods, fair trade coffee, and some lunch food. Has gluten-free, dairy-free, egg-less, flour-less, no yeast added, no sugar added, and diabetic-friendly. Their Toronto location shut down Jan 2013 & owners are looking for a new location.
